value:
I like to believe that heroes are born
from people's wishes.

My father is Eliwood, the Marquess of
Pherae. He's a hero known as the
Knight of Lycia.

I want to help out so you can take a
break. Do you mind if I observe you
for a bit to get a sense of your work?

This is Durandal, the sword of sacred
fire... It's a legendary weapon. My
father once wielded it, too.

I haven't had much training in
mounted combat. I've still got a lot to
learn.

Are you $Nu?
I've brought you a message from your
friend $Nf.

Someday I'll be just like my
father!

I think I'm getting the hang of
fighting on horseback.

I need to learn more from my
father's example.

This is all because of you.
Thank you.

I'm Roy. With this sword Durandal in
hand, I will aid your army in place of
my father.

When I was young, Marcus—a knight
who has long served my family—told
me many tales about my father.$k$pHe spoke of the heroic things my
father did in his younger days, the
many allies he met on his travels...$k$pAnd he told me about how my parents
first met.$k$pI would get so excited hearing those
stories. I looked forward to them far
more than any other tale.$k$pThat's why I admire my father so
much. He's my hero.$k$pI may resemble him, but I still have so
much to learn.$k$pAnd I have to get a lot stronger before
I can truly claim to be like him. But if I
stay by your side...$k$pI'm sure I'll be able to accomplish that
goal. I promise you I'll continue to do
my best.
ええいっ！
行くよ！
うああっ！
しまった…
For my father!
I will protect everyone!
I'm just getting started!
Durandal!
Father...I'm sorry.
Haha
I can't measure up to my father, but if I work hard, I hope I'll become more like him.
Hm? Did you call for me?
I had a strange dream. So many people, calling my name...
I want to repay all those who have supported me.
My father is unmatched at fighting, even on horseback. I have much to learn from him.
People are swayed by their desires. However, they can also overcome them.
Sometimes I feel like the two of us have known each other for a long time.
Got it.
Now what?
The fight is on!
